sentences.en: But the main clefts are chronological and clannish rather than ideological.
sentences.cn: 有些人对卡梅隆先生可爱的面貌重塑的嘲笑不已.

sentences.en: Carbon dating provides the archaeologist with a basic chronological framework.
sentences.cn: 碳元素年代测定法给考古学家提供了基本的年代框架.

sentences.en: Chronological Biography of Fu Baoshi. Shanghai Rarebooks Publishing House, 2004.
sentences.cn: 《傅抱石年谱》, 叶宗镐编,上海古籍出版社2004年.

sentences.en: GHBP was not related to E 2, chronological age and bone age.
sentences.cn: GHBP与E2 、 年龄(CA) 骨龄(BA)无相关关系.

sentences.en: Give me the dates in chronological order.
sentences.cn: 把日期按年月顺序给我.

sentences.en: I have arranged these stories in chronological order.
sentences.cn: 我按时间顺序排列了这些故事。

sentences.en: It does not fit into any stylistic or chronological category.
sentences.cn: 悉尼歌剧院无法归入任何一种按照风格或年代编排的分类.

sentences.en: Please list the teaching experiences in chronological order.
sentences.cn: 请顺序列出敎育工作经验.如有需要,可另纸书写.

sentences.en: Talk at the person's chronological age level, " he said. "
sentences.cn: 要在他们生理年龄的水平上和他们 交谈 .

sentences.en: The cultural relics are displayed in chronological sequence.
The program of work - chronological and operation of two main groups.
sentences.cn: 程序化工作法有时序型和工序型两大类.

sentences.en: The register is listed in chronological order of the date of ASPs.
sentences.cn: 以上买卖合约记录以日期排序.

sentences.en: The report is filed in chronological order.
sentences.cn: 报告是按年代日期顺序归档的.

sentences.en: This is not merely a chronological change.
sentences.cn: 不仅意味着年代上的更新.

sentences.en: Two appendixes are affixed : Wuxi Gu's pedigree and chronological table. "
sentences.cn: 正文后还有两个附录: 无锡泾皋顾氏世系表和 顾贞 观年表.

sentences.en: We arranged the documents in chronological order .
sentences.cn: 我们把这些文件按时序排列。

trans.tran_cn: 按时间的前后顺序排列的，编年的
trans.tran_en: arranged according to when things happened or were made
